extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CHEE 210 and ENCH 245 or CHEM 245, or CHEM 221 and CHEM 223. Must also be registered in BSCE

basic.description: Four topics covering a range of self-assembled molecular systems will be discussed: monolayers and bilayers, block co-polymers, nanoparticles, and liquid crystals. Material properties, synthetic methods and application of these systems in current and emerging technologies, including nanotechnologies, will be covered. Offered Alternating years with ENCH 424 (CHEM 424).
basic.subject: ENCH
basic.title: Self Assembly & Materials
